attributes.action: Pull British troops out of Iraq and Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enough blood has been shed fighting other peoples wars.  My 6 year old daughter's school friend has just lost her daddy, a father of two. How many more lives need to be lost?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
